info.name: TableColumnMenuGrid
info.summary: Alternative table column visibility menu, using a drag grid
info.description:
The Table widget's column visibility menu is not scrollable and
        becomes truncated if the table height is too small for all of the
        column names to be presented in the menu. This alternative column
        visibility menu presents the table column names is two columns of the
        menu: a column for the visible table column names, and a column for
        the hidden table column names. The names may be selected and dragged
        from one column to the other to affect column visiblity changes.
